Name: Bourbon Renewal
Ingredients: 15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Double old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel/wedge &/or blackcurrants/blackberries when in season.
Review: Berry fruit supplements rather than dominates bourbon in this sour.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2004 by Jeffrey Morgenthaler at Bel Ami Lounge in Eugene, Oregon. Jeff named this cocktail after a band his business partner, Tony Figoli, was in years before, saying " I thought the name was absolutely brilliant, so I decided to do up a drink to commemorate the band – and my favorite spirit at the time. "
Nutrition: One serving of Bourbon Renewal contains 228 calories
